CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 16, 1953, pg. 7, reads: "Annual May Festival - The Children's Choir of Wesley Center AME Zion Church held its second annual May Festival on May 7 in church vestry. The winding of the Maypole shown here was one of the features on the program which included a Nature Pageant and the crowning of the May Queen.  Grace B. Nicholson was crowned queen.  Francine Harris was the attendant.  Mrs. Marjorie Walton is directress of the group.  The Rev. C. H. Foggie is pastor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eight girls wearing two tone dresses, winding maypole for annual May festival in Wesley Center AME Zion Church
